scripts.prepare: mkdir -p src; protoc -I ${PROTOLOC:-$GOPATH/src/github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway}/third_party/googleapis -I /usr/lib/protoc/include --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=`which grpc_tools_node_protoc_plugin` --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:src --grpc_out=grpc_js:src -I${PROTOLOC:-..} ${PROTOLOC:-..}/*.proto && protoc -I ${PROTOLOC:-$GOPATH/src/github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway}/third_party/googleapis -I /usr/lib/protoc/include --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=`which protoc-gen-ts` --ts_out=grpc_js:src -I${PROTOLOC:-..} ${PROTOLOC:-..}/*.proto && sed -i '/google_api_annotations_pb/d' src/*.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p lib; tsc && cp -f src/*.js src/*d.ts lib
